ticket.title: binary_to_string is called even on BLOB column in SQLite3 adapter
ticket.original-body:
binary_to_string is called on every column (even if BLOB), causing ArgumentError: invalid byte sequence in UTF-8 error:
@@@ ArgumentError: invalid byte sequence in UTF-8 /home/kuba/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.1-p378/gems/activerecord-3.0.0.beta/lib/active_record/connection_adapters/sqlite_adapter.rb:37:in `gsub' /home/kuba/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.1-p378/gems/activerecord-3.0.0.beta/lib/active_record/connection_adapters/sqlite_adapter.rb:37:in `binary_to_string' /home/kuba/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.1-p378/gems/activerecord-3.0.0.beta/lib/active_record/attribute_methods/read.rb:69:in `avatar' @@@
The problem can be reproduced running sqlite3 (not sqlite3-ruby) test suite with activerecord version 3.0.0.beta installed.
